attributes.action: Cap the executive pay in those banks receiving tax payers money to £200,000 per annum(8 times the national average).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people are still lavishly rewarding themselves,but this time with tax payers money.They are deaf to calls for restraint and morality.Legislation is the only way.Should this fail I recommend that we temporarily Nationalise all the banks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
